articles.description: All the reaction to weekend games with Man City, Spurs, Everton and Fulham winners on Sunday in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League, WSL reaction & latest football news

articles.description: Manchester City returned to winning ways against Luton on Sunday, but are last year's Treble-winners in the right shape to mount another title bid?
articles.title: ‘They will still win the league’ – is Man City’s ‘mini-crisis’ over?

articles.description: Girona underline their La Liga title credentials with a famous victory over Barcelona to move top of the table.
articles.title: Girona top La Liga after famous win at Barcelona

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who is a real hero? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: England miss the chance to record a series clean sweep over India after falling to a five-wicket defeat in the third and final T20 in Mumbai.
articles.title: Subpar England beaten by India in final T20

articles.description: Granada's La Liga match with Athletic Bilbao is abandoned after a supporter dies in the stands at Nuevo Los Carmenes stadium.
articles.title: Granada match abandoned after fan dies in stands

articles.description: The Buffalo Bills edge out the Kansas City Chiefs while the San Francisco 49ers win a fifth in a row and Dallas beat Philadelphia.
articles.title: Chiefs furious with loss to Bills as 49ers roll on

articles.description: Bronny James, the son of legend LeBron James, says he is "thankful for everything" as he makes his college debut just months after collapsing with a cardiac arrest.
articles.title: Bronny James: LeBron James' son makes college debut after cardiac arrest

articles.description: Newcastle manager Eddie Howe has dealt expertly with all challenges placed in front of him since arriving, but is now facing his biggest at the worst possible time.
articles.title: Newcastle running on fumes, while Spurs hope they're back on track

articles.description: Romelu Lukaku scores but is later sent off as nine-man Roma hold on for a point at home to Fiorentina in Serie A.
articles.title: Lukaku sent off as nine-man Roma hold Fiorentina
